title: Define Project Scope, Requirements, and Constraints (Revised)
description: Update the existing document detailing the project's scope, functional and non-functional requirements, performance specifications, desired outputs, potential security concerns, compliance regulations, and any other relevant constraints for the CrowdBehaviorAnalyzer AI software. This will serve as a foundation for the development process. Include clear definitions of project boundaries, system architecture, data handling practices, error management strategies, and scalability considerations. Additionally, detail the expected impact on performance under varying crowd sizes and environmental conditions.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components for video input, crowd behavior analysis, threat detection, and output generation. Define the data flow, communication protocols, and integration points.

title: Develop Video Input Module
description: Implement the module responsible for receiving and processing video input from various sources, such as CCTV cameras or live streams.

title: Implement Crowd Behavior Analysis
description: Develop the core AI algorithms and models for analyzing crowd behavior patterns, detecting anomalies, and identifying potential threats or emergencies.

title: Build Output Generation Module
description: Create the module responsible for generating and presenting the analysis results, including visual representations, alerts, and integration with external systems or dashboards.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and develop the data storage and management components, including databases, caching mechanisms, and data pipelines for storing and retrieving video footage, analysis results, and system logs.

title: Develop Security and Privacy Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect the system from unauthorized access, data breaches, and cyber threats. Ensure compliance with relevant privacy regulations and data protection laws.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the software components, ensuring a streamlined and reliable release process.

title: Create Test Plan and Test Cases
description: Develop a comprehensive test plan and write test cases to validate the system's functionality, performance, and security, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create technical documentation, including system architecture diagrams, API references, deployment guides, and user manuals, to support the development, deployment, and maintenance of the software.
